sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>active, default, definition and buider_properties should be read only in sys_one_extend_builder_capability </description>
        <name>Make builder capability columns readonly</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[updateColumn(["active","default","builder_properties","definition"]);
function updateColumn(elements) {
	for (var i = 0; i < elements.length; i++) {
		var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
		gr.addQuery("name", "sys_one_extend_builder_capability");
		gr.addQuery("element", elements[i]);
		gr.query();
		if (gr.next()) {
			gr.setValue("read_only", "true");
			gr.update();
		}
	}
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-04-24 19:35:10</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>3ef73517c3122110634cdb450a40ddce</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Make builder capability columns readonly</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Glide OneExtend" source="com.glide.one_extend">dc98175b47220210cd4e1ce4316d4324</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_3ef73517c3122110634cdb450a40ddce</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-07-03 23:26:46</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
